level.heading: Transition of professional counselors.
level.text: For a period of 2 years following July 22, 1992, all reference to a professional counselor shall be deemed to refer to a person meeting the requirements for licensure in the District, regardless of whether that person is licensed.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-126, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-1202.13.
